snippet: Manchester City's 25-year-old France defender Eliaquim Mangala has moved to Valencia on a season-long loan deal, the clubs announced on Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: Manchester City's Mangala Moves to Valencia on Loan

lead_paragraph: Manchester City's 25-year-old France defender Eliaquim Mangala has moved to Valencia on a season-long loan deal, the clubs announced on Wednesday.

snippet: Stoke City's Stephen Ireland broke his leg in training on Tuesday, bringing an early end to a season blighted by injury for the midfielder....

snippet: Southampton manager Claude Puel has urged his squad not to get carried away after Thursday's 2-1 Europa League win over Italian side Inter Milan as they still have work to do to secure qualification to the knockout stages....

headline.main: Europa Work Still to Be Done, Says Southampton's Puel
headline.print_headline: Europa Work Still to Be Done, Says Southampton's Puel

lead_paragraph: Southampton manager Claude Puel has urged his squad not to get carried away after Thursday's 2-1 Europa League win over Italian side Inter Milan as they still have work to do to secure qualification to the knockout stages.

snippet: Watford staged an astonishing recovery against basement side Aston Villa with two late goals from Troy Deeney to ease the pressure on manager Quique Sanchez Flores....

snippet: REUTERS - Manchester City thrashed Stoke City 4-0 at the Etihad Stadium on Saturday to leapfrog Arsenal into third place in the Premier League....

snippet: Manchester City scored three early goals on the way to an emphatic 4-0 win over Bournemouth on Saturday that kept them fourth in the Premier League....

lead_paragraph: Manchester City scored three early goals on the way to an emphatic 4-0 win over Bournemouth on Saturday that kept them fourth in the Premier League.

snippet: - Defender Winston Reid fired the winner in the fourth minute of stoppage time as West Ham beat bottom club Sunderland 1-0 in the Premier League on Saturday....

headline.main: Last-Gasp Reid Gives West Ham Victory Over Sunderland
headline.print_headline: Last-Gasp Reid Gives West Ham Victory Over Sunderland

lead_paragraph: - Defender Winston Reid fired the winner in the fourth minute of stoppage time as West Ham beat bottom club Sunderland 1-0 in the Premier League on Saturday.
